languages.text: {n}Вам удается увлечь Соломона своим порывом, его движения обретают грацию, вы встречаетесь взглядами... И новый укол боли пронзает вторую вашу ногу.{/n}
{n}You manage to sweep Solomorne along on your sudden charge, his movements becoming more graceful, your eyes meeting his... until a new jolt of pain stabs through your other foot.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вам удается увлечь Соломона своим порывом, его движения обретают грацию, вы встречаетесь взглядами... И новый укол боли пронзает вторую вашу ногу.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es gelingt dir, Solomorne mit deinem plötzlichen Energieschub mitzureißen. Seine Bewegungen werden anmutiger, dein Blick trifft den seinen ... bis ein plötzlicher Schmerz durch deinen anderen Fuß schießt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You manage to sweep Solomorne along on your sudden charge, his movements becoming more graceful, your eyes meeting his... until a new jolt of pain stabs through your other foot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es gelingt dir, Solomorne mit deinem plötzlichen Energieschub mitzureißen. Seine Bewegungen werden anmutiger, dein Blick trifft den seinen ... bis ein plötzlicher Schmerz durch deinen anderen Fuß schießt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous réussissez à entraîner Solomorne dans la danse en prenant les choses en main. Ses mouvements se font plus gracieux, vos regards se croisent... puis un nouvel éclair de douleur foudroie votre autre pied.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You manage to sweep Solomorne along on your sudden charge, his movements becoming more graceful, your eyes meeting his... until a new jolt of pain stabs through your other foot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous réussissez à entraîner Solomorne dans la danse en prenant les choses en main. Ses mouvements se font plus gracieux, vos regards se croisent... puis un nouvel éclair de douleur foudroie votre autre pied.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたが突然勢いよく踏み出すと、ソロモーンもなんとかその動きについてきて、彼の所作は次第に優雅さを帯びていった。あなたと彼の視線が重なり、その瞬間、もう片方の足に新たな激痛が走った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You manage to sweep Solomorne along on your sudden charge, his movements becoming more graceful, your eyes meeting his... until a new jolt of pain stabs through your other foot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが突然勢いよく踏み出すと、ソロモーンもなんとかその動きについてきて、彼の所作は次第に優雅さを帯びていった。あなたと彼の視線が重なり、その瞬間、もう片方の足に新たな激痛が走った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Logras que Solomorne te acompañe en tu repentino movimiento. Se vuelve más grácil y vuestros ojos se cruzan... y de pronto sientes una punzada de dolor en el otro pie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You manage to sweep Solomorne along on your sudden charge, his movements becoming more graceful, your eyes meeting his... until a new jolt of pain stabs through your other foot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Logras que Solomorne te acompañe en tu repentino movimiento. Se vuelve más grácil y vuestros ojos se cruzan... y de pronto sientes una punzada de dolor en el otro pie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你突然向前跑了几步，领着索罗蒙一起跳了起来。索罗蒙的动作变得更加优雅，你们两人凝视着对方的双眼……而这个时候，你另一只脚传来了另一阵剧痛。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You manage to sweep Solomorne along on your sudden charge, his movements becoming more graceful, your eyes meeting his... until a new jolt of pain stabs through your other foot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你突然向前跑了几步，领着索罗蒙一起跳了起来。索罗蒙的动作变得更加优雅，你们两人凝视着对方的双眼……而这个时候，你另一只脚传来了另一阵剧痛。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ani bir hamleyle Solomorne'u sürüklemeyi başarıyorsun, hareketleri zarafet kazanıyor, gözleriniz nihayet buluşuyor... Ta ki diğer ayağın da acıyla ezilene kadar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You manage to sweep Solomorne along on your sudden charge, his movements becoming more graceful, your eyes meeting his... until a new jolt of pain stabs through your other foot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ani bir hamleyle Solomorne'u sürüklemeyi başarıyorsun, hareketleri zarafet kazanıyor, gözleriniz nihayet buluşuyor... Ta ki diğer ayağın da acıyla ezilene kadar.{/n}
